The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 05 August is 265,023 (470.8 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 01 August, there were 4,919 new confirmed cases (8.7 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 25 July, there were 4,538 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 8% (381 extra cases).
